name: Further Below
description:
A cave visit takes a treacherous turn.  Explore, salvage, and use your wits -- and your tumbling skills -- to survive.

Recommended keying options:

1. Arrows to move, C to jump, X (held while running) to begin backflipping

2. WASD to move, J to jump, K (held while running) to begin backflipping

Created in about 4 weeks for the Metroidvania Month 17 Game Jam.   All art, animations, programming, music and fonts by me; helpful programming tutorials credited in-line.
